languages.text: Any {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} attacks made with a sword deal +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This bonus damage is doubled if using a two-handed sword.

traits.locale_text: Any attack that the Reaper does with a sword deals an additional (Agility Bonus)% damage. This bonus damage is doubled for two-handed swords.
The Bladedancer's attacks made with a sword deal +<u>AGI bonus</u>% additional damage. This bonus damage is doubled, if the Bladedancer uses a two-handed sword.
The Bladedancer's attacks made with a sword deal +<u>AGI bonus</u>% additional damage. This bonus damage is doubled, if the Bladedancer uses a two-handed sword.
Any Bladedancer attacks made with a sword deal +<u>AGI bonus</u>% additional damage. This bonus damage is doubled if using a two-handed sword.

Any {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} attacks made with a sword deal +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This bonus damage is doubled if using a two-handed sword.

Any {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} attacks made with a sword deal +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This bonus damage is doubled if using a two-handed sword.

languages.text: Todos los ataques con espada del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} infligen +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional. Esta bonificación se duplica al usar una espada a dos manos.

This bonus damage is doubled if using a two-handed sword.

traits.locale_text: Todos los ataques con espada del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} infligen +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional. languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}の剣を使うあらゆる攻撃は、+<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。このボーナスダメージは、両手剣を使用する場合、倍になる。
languages.original_text: Any {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} attacks made with a sword deal +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This bonus damage is doubled if using a two-handed sword.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}の剣を使うあらゆる攻撃は、+<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>%の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。このボーナスダメージは、両手剣を使用する場合、倍になる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}使用长剑进行的所有攻击，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>%。当使用双手大剑时，此伤害加值翻倍。
languages.original_text: Any {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} attacks made with a sword deal +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This bonus damage is doubled if using a two-handed sword.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}使用长剑进行的所有攻击，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>%。当使用双手大剑时，此伤害加值翻倍。

languages.text: Les attaques de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} réalisées avec une épée infligent +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires. Ce bonus est doublé avec une épée à deux mains.
languages.original_text: Any {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} attacks made with a sword deal +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u>% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This bonus damage is doubled if using a two-handed sword.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} réalisées avec une épée infligent +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires. Ce bonus est doublé avec une épée à deux mains.

languages.text: Alles Angriffe eines {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzers{/g} mit einem Schwert verursachen +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> % zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Dieser Zusatzschaden wird verdoppelt, falls ein zweihändiges Schwert benutzt wird.

This bonus damage is doubled if using a two-handed sword.

traits.locale_text: Alles Angriffe eines {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzers{/g} mit einem Schwert verursachen +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> % zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Dieser Zusatzschaden wird verdoppelt, falls ein zweihändiges Schwert benutzt wird.

languages.text: Все атаки {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцора смерти{/g} мечом наносят +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g}</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно. При использовании двуручного меча этот бонус удваивается.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}'nın kılıçla yaptığı her türlü saldırısı, +%<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ÇEV{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}</u> ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
